text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product title.

Product title:
Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design

Product specifications:
Made of 14 gauge Steel
Comes with 60 in. Mounting rod
Antique copper Finish
Sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure easy and fluid movement
Garden Mount Only
text.Response A: Okay, I’ll be very direct here, because this is pretty tricky.  The “Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design” is a weather vane that is designed to be mounted on a pole in a garden.  It’s made of 14 gauge steel, and has sealed ball bearings to ensure smooth movement.  The color is antique copper.

meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
